options.text: Both <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> and water get oxidized
Both  <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>  and water get reduced
Water is reduced and  <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>  is oxidized

<math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>  gets reduced and  <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math>  gets oxidized

solution.text: Photosynthesis is an anabolic process occurring in certain species of bacteria, protists and plants. It involves use of carbon dioxide and water to form sugars and oxygen. During the process of photosynthesis carbon dioxide from the atmosphere gets fixed through reduction reaction to form sugars and water is the source of oxygen released during the process.
